Author: S3cco
Title: ✅[ANN]🔥ICO has ended 14,000,000 Total Tokens Don't miss last opportunity! 🚀
Body: AstorGame Shakes Up The Casino/Betting Industry With Launch Of ICO & Revolutionary Betting Platform That Accepts Cryptocurrency: https://bitcoingarden.org/astorgame-shakes-casino-betting-industry-launch-ico-revolutionary-betting-platform-accepts-cryptocurrency/  AstorGame sent shockwaves through the gaming industry today with the announcement that they will be launching an ICO backed by a decentralized betting platform that will accept cryptocurrency as payment. Players will have access to sports betting, tournaments, casinos and more. AstorGame is changing the traditional eSports and betting world with a brand new eSports and online gaming platform based on cutting-edge blockchain technology, where users are provided with a choice between gaming and betting. The funds brought in by AstorGames’ players will be protected by a smart contract, completely removing the middleman.  AstorGame was developed by a group of likeminded developers and gaming experts that were ready to deliver a unique gaming experience to the cryptocurrency community. The team at AstorGame has more than 15 years of experience in the world of gaming and betting as well as the development of several different platforms using various technologies. One such technology known as Provably Fair, enables the client to check and make sure that each game is played by the rules and that values have not been altered by a third party in order to place them at a disadvantage. The AstorGame platform unlike most others, uses this technology and is currently indevelopment stages.The Beta version is expected to be released soon....

Author: astorgame
Title: ✅[ANN]🔥ICO has ended 14,000,000 Total Tokens Don't miss last opportunity! 🚀
Body: Website | Whitepaper | Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | Telegram  Español | Filipino | Pyccкий | Bahasa Indonesia | Hindi | Română | Czech | 한국어 (Korean) | Arabic  | Türkçe | Português | Polski | 中文 (Chinese) | Italiano | Français    Join our official Bounty Thread here  AstorGame eSport & Online Gambling platform – Decentralized games, sports betting and Casino using blockchain, smart contracts + Provably Fair  AstorGame will change the eSports and betting world with an eSports and online gambling platform developed using cutting-edge technology on which each person, in accordance with his or her profile, can choose between gaming and betting. If you are an eSports player, you can use the eSports platform to take part in matches and tournaments of games such as League of Legends, FIFA 17, Dota 2, Counter-Strike, Playerunknown's Battlegrounds and Halo, among many others that will be added over time.  If you prefer to place bets on: events or tournaments, eSports, sports, casino games, or games of chance, then can sign into the betting platform, casino, or lottery developed specifically for this specific client profile.    Security and Smart Contracts  These two concepts are the foundation of the change that we at AstorGame are planning for the gaming and betting sector. At all times, the funds paid in by AstorGame’s players will be protected by a smart contract, which is to say that if there are, between players and bettors, ten thousand users on the web platform and it is attacked or, for some reason, goes offline, the funds will automatically be returned to their respective owners by means of the smart contracts.  The platform will enable entries to be recorded on a blockchain and allow for the utilization of intelligent contracts to manage the logic of the business, schedule prize payments, collect payments for tickets, bets, and drawings, and schedule tournaments and outcomes. All of this data is public and can be verified at any time.   Provably Fair  Casino bettors and lottery players have often felt unsure about whether the house was cheating them by manipulating the outcome. At AstorGame, we use various technologies to solve this problem. One of these, Provably Fair, enables the client to verify that each game played follows the rules and that values have not been changed by a third party in order to put them at a disadvantage.  Currently, encryption technologies are a big help in coding a string of values, be they numbers, text, or alphanumeric, thus preventing anyone from “cracking” the outcome and changing it. An encrypted value will be acquired from the user’s browser that will not be known to AstorGame’s server.   Smart Contracts + Provably Fair  It is possible that Provably Fair is already being used in some online casinos, but no online casino offers both of these applied technologies on the same platform. The use of Provably Fair and CSRNG, which generates numbers randomly, does not guarantee that a casino will deliver the prizes in a legal manner or that the funds corresponding to this pot will not disappear. It is here that smart contracts become more important, since they can be programmed so that the pot of a bet will be retained until it is known whether the user has won the bet. If the user wins, there is no way for the owner of the casino to keep the pot or to delay payment, as happens in many gambling houses, That’s why we at AstorGame are the first to combine both platforms for the benefit of our clients.   Goal      To become, within a period of 10 years, a leading online gaming company on the global market.  Objectives  To offer a variety of games in different categories to secure the inflow of a variety of client profiles To develop to the fullest extent each of the gaming sectors in which AstorGame will participate To promote AstorGame on a global level, setting ourselves apart through the use of new technologies, customer service, and the freshness of our games To offer efficiency, speed, security and transparency to all of our clients To expand the market, offering free courses for bettors on other shared platforms so that they might understand how the use of technologies like blockchain and smart contracts benefit them  Online Gaming Platforms  eSports games and tournaments eSports betting (including the capacity for "live betting") Sports betting (including the capacity for "live betting") Casino games Lotteries     Token details A total of 100,000,000 Astor tokens will be issued without any additional tokens. These ERC20 compatible tokens based on the Ethereum blockchain.  Token name:   ASTOR Project protocol:   ERC20 Total amount:   100,000,000 = 100% Token Sale:   60,000,000 = 60% Pre-sale:   17,000,000 = 17% Start date (Pre-Sale):   10 Jan 2018 Amount of tokens per person:   unlimited Additional tokens emission:   impossible  No token creation, minting or mining after the Token Sale is over. Unused and unsold tokens will be burned.  PRE-SALE DETAILS Pre-sale period:   14 days Start date:   10 Jan 2018 00:00 UTC End date:   23 Jan 2018 (or until sold out) Available tokens on Pre-sale:   17,000,000 Price:   1 Astor = 1 USD Min transaction amount:   1 ASTOR  TOKEN SALE DETAILS Token Sale period:   90 days Start date:   29 Jan 2018 00.00 UTC End date:   29 Apr 2018 (or until sold out) Available tokens on Token Sale:   60,000,000 Price:   1 Astor = 1 USD Min transaction amount:   1 ASTOR  Bonus : Week 1 & 2: 40% (buy 100 ASTOR = receive 140 ASTOR) Week 3 & 4: 20% (buy 100 ASTOR = receive 120 ASTOR) Week 5 & 6: 10% (buy 100 ASTOR = receive 110 ASTOR)   Stay Connected ! ________________________________________________________________________ Website | Whitepaper | Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | Telegram

Author: rehydrogenated
Title: ✅[ANN]🔥ICO has ended 14,000,000 Total Tokens Don't miss last opportunity! 🚀
Body: A good gambling project. Without a doubt one of the main features of the blockchain is decentralized gambling. Many of these gambling projects are hugely successful (even the scam ones do fairly well at first). Cutting out the middlemen is a huge boon to the gamblers themselves, the casino take is ultra high when you just look around and see the overhead they must support. Vegas is a prime example of "The House Always Wins". Maybe one day we will use the blockchain to unlock a truly fair way to gamble and the profits only go to those actually doing the work - the miners and the devs.  Good luck dev team, I will keep a close watch on this project!

Author: astorgame
Title: ✅[ANN]🔥ICO has ended 14,000,000 Total Tokens Don't miss last opportunity! 🚀
Body: Hi Lubing7683,  in our strategy we will use different ways to be close of the new customers for example viral marketing, we vote and prefer physical events, sports & eSports events  our goal is to get closer to the public, show them a new side of online bets, and players a new way to perform or witness eSports events, highlight in the simple of the platform, in the transparency of the game  we think is necessary to follow the big ones, for example bitcoin, a single developer, without a company afterwards promoting it, but it offers a disruptive product that changes many concepts of society.  currently 1% of the whole population understands blockchain and smart contracts, 30 years ago only a few understood of computers  and programming languages, currently the majority of the world's population interacts daily with operating systems not only on their computers or cell phones, also while they watch Television, while they cross the street , read a book in their kindle or take the subway to their work  in our plans also is to approach our platforms in a friendly way to users who interact in other traditional gaming platforms and teach them that we offer a totally transparent and immutable gaming experience with transactions in real time and in fact these are the characteristics of blockchain technology, and that is why we are developing the business based on these concepts, because it is something very innovative and that will change the rules play in many aspects of society.  How do you reach the public and show you the benefits of a new product? delivering demonstrations to test the product, approaching the customer further from the screen of a monitor, instructing them in this new technology, eSports, for example, is a large market of very young people who perform a sport, here they are not only bets or casino games, eSports players are athletes, astorgame not only based on the online platforms, events are also planned in physical places in the future, that's what our main strategy is about getting closer to the public, not waiting for the public to come to us in cyberspace  I hope that my words also serve those projects that were launched or are being launched at this moment, projects are made to attract people, and there are few who come to the real world, beyond cyberspace and show how it is used and the benefits of using these platforms that is why companies like Microsoft became the companies that they are today, because they also have a novel product, they approached the public, in every house there is a windows system even for those who use linux at some point in their lives they must interact with a system using  Microsoft product, they have in their online platforms completely free courses in addition to events that take place around the world constantly and since its inception We could also talk about companies like Oracle, Facebook, Yahoo or Google among the best known.   I can not reveal all our marketing plan and future plans because it can use another company of the competition and as we know it is not very positive for a business if this happens.  about how to protect ourselves from cheaters we have several options, for now we have our attention on a client that offers ESEA for games like counter strike, this while we finish developing our own anti-cheat software  I hope everybody can understand my english language   and hope also that your question has the answer that you expect, anyway... everybody  can contact me in linkedin or facebook there is the link in www.astorgame.com  or email  to info@astorgame.com can also feel free write to my personal email paulmx77@hotmail.com
